name: ExtensionTasks
description: Package, publish, and manage Azure DevOps extensions and Visual Studio Marketplace extensions
author: Jesse Houwing

inputs.name: operation
inputs.label: Operation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Operation to perform on the extension

inputs.name: connectionType
inputs.label: Connection Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of service connection to use for authentication

inputs.name: connectionName
inputs.label: Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service connection for marketplace authentication

inputs.name: connectionNameAzureRM
inputs.label: Azure RM Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager service connection with workload identity

inputs.name: connectionNameGeneric
inputs.label: Generic Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generic service connection with username/password

inputs.name: tfxVersion
inputs.label: tfx-cli Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of tfx-cli to use: 'built-in' (bundled with task), 'path' (from system PATH), or a version spec (e.g., '^0.17', 'latest')

inputs.name: publisherId
inputs.label: Publisher ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publisher ID for the extension
inputs.visibleRule: operation = package || operation = publish || operation = unpublish || operation = share || operation = unshare || operation = install || operation = show || operation = isValid || operation = verifyInstall

inputs.name: extensionId
inputs.label: Extension ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension ID (unique within publisher)
inputs.visibleRule: operation = package || operation = publish || operation = unpublish || operation = share || operation = unshare || operation = install || operation = show || operation = isValid || operation = verifyInstall

inputs.name: extensionTag
inputs.label: Extension Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag to append to extension ID (e.g., -dev, -preview)

inputs.name: publishSource
inputs.label: Publish Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source for publishing: manifest files or pre-built .vsix file

inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.label: Root Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder containing extension files
inputs.visibleRule: operation = package || (operation = publish && publishSource = manifest) || operation = isValid

inputs.name: localizationRoot
inputs.label: Localization Root Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where localization files exist

inputs.name: manifestGlobs
inputs.label: Manifest Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Glob patterns for manifest files (one per line). Example: vss-extension.json
inputs.visibleRule: operation = package || (operation = publish && publishSource = manifest) || operation = isValid

inputs.name: vsixFile
inputs.label: VSIX File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the .vsix file to publish

inputs.name: extensionVersion
inputs.label: Extension Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override extension version (e.g., 1.2.3 or $(Build.BuildNumber))
inputs.visibleRule: operation = package || operation = publish || operation = install

inputs.name: extensionName
inputs.label: Extension Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override extension display name

inputs.name: extensionVisibility
inputs.label: Extension Visibility
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override extension visibility

inputs.name: extensionPricing
inputs.label: Extension Pricing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override extension pricing (Free vs Paid). If not specified, pricing from manifest will be used

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output path for generated .vsix file

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable name to store output (VSIX path for package, metadata for show)

inputs.name: bypassValidation
inputs.label: Bypass Validation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip extension validation checks

inputs.name: revVersion
inputs.label: Auto-increment Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically increment patch version

inputs.name: shareWith
inputs.label: Share With
inputs.helpMarkDown: Organizations to share with (one per line). Example: myorg1\nmyorg2
inputs.visibleRule: (operation = publish && (extensionVisibility = private || extensionVisibility = private_preview || extensionVisibility = default)) || operation = share

inputs.name: unshareWith
inputs.label: Unshare With
inputs.helpMarkDown: Organizations to unshare from (one per line)

inputs.name: accounts
inputs.label: Accounts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps accounts/organizations (one per line). Example: https://dev.azure.com/myorg1

inputs.name: noWaitValidation
inputs.label: No Wait for Validation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not wait for marketplace validation to complete

inputs.name: updateTasksVersion
inputs.label: Update Task Versions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update all task versions to match extension version

inputs.name: updateTasksVersionType
inputs.label: Update Tasks Version Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify which part(s) of version to update: Major (x.y.r), Minor (1.y.r), or Patch (1.0.r)

inputs.name: updateTasksId
inputs.label: Update Task IDs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generate new deterministic task IDs

inputs.name: maxRetries
inputs.label: Max Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum retry attempts

inputs.name: minTimeout
inputs.label: Min Timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum timeout between retries

inputs.name: maxTimeout
inputs.label: Max Timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum timeout between retries

inputs.name: expectedTasks
inputs.label: Expected Tasks (JSON)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Expected tasks as JSON array: [{"name": "TaskName", "versions": ["1.0.0"]}]

inputs.name: manifestPath
inputs.label: Manifest Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to extension manifest (auto-discovers task versions)

inputs.name: vsixPath
inputs.label: VSIX Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to .vsix file (extracts task versions)

inputs.name: timeoutMinutes
inputs.label: Timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum time to wait for tasks to become available

inputs.name: pollingIntervalSeconds
inputs.label: Polling Interval (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Interval between availability checks

inputs.name: tfxVersion
inputs.label: TFX Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of tfx-cli to use (embedded, latest, or specific like 0.17.x)
